metadata.name: The Bachelor Machine #1
metadata.description:
Unlike real machines the bachelor machine appears as an impossible, useless, delirious machine. 
It may consist of a single peculiar and unknown machine or of an heteroclite assemblage of pieces and fragments of anything. 
The bachelor machine has no reason for existing in itself, it’s a semblance of machinery governed by the mental laws of subjectivity that adopts certain mechanical and/or organic forms in order to produce a movement of the mind. 
It’s a pataphysical machine.

AI + PS
PNG 4400 x 5000 px
1/1 Edition 
Explosante-Fixe, 2023
